data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Csuzdi, Csaba, Razafindrakoto, Malalatiana, Hong, Yong (2016): The second species of the endemic Malagasy earthworm genus Howascolex Michaelsen, 1901, Howascolexfarafangana sp. n. (Clitellata, Megadrili). African Invertebrates 57 (2): 83-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10048, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10048
